ROW.NAME: test28
ROW.COLLIST: DEFORG 默认组织号,ID 编号,NAME 名称,CLS 分类,NOTE 描述,TITLE 页面标题

ROW.DATDSC: select logoimg img, id||'-'||name||'~'||note name, id, NVL(title,name) title, deforg , logoimg,guid from layobj where deforg='[%thisdeforg]' and cls='[%clsid]' order by id
select logoimg img, id||'-'||name||'~'||note name, id, NVL(title,name) title, deforg , logoimg,guid from layhdr where deforg='[%thisdeforg]' and cls='[%clsid]' order by id
select guid from LAYOBJ where id='[%id]' and deforg='[%deforg]'
select guid from LAYHDR where id='[%id]' and deforg='[%deforg]'
